location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Patrick Ryan to Lewis Pelly

mods.abstract: Letter, marked private, regarding the 'supreme Government's' decision to uphold Pelly's censure whilst agreeing with his vindication, acknowledging his excellent service and forwarding the discussion to the Secretary of State for India.The letter goes on to discuss the disasters of the financial situation of Bombay and to discuss Muscat affairs.
